name: Tower Bombarde
description:
If you can't shoot and there is a wall of turrets against you - you're not defenseless! Let your enemies kill each other! Avoid the shots, make them blow the turrets of big bosses! There are 100 levels of fun in this game, with the most various combinations of enemies!

Features

  • Minimalistic neon design
  • Casual game process (all you need is mouse with two buttons)
  • Ten locations, each of them ends with unique boss
  • More than ten types of turrets those are ready to tear each other apart
  • More than ten hours of gameplay

Controls

  • Mouse - movement, shield, start of level, reborn
